extendedInfo.description: You are marooned on the shores of an infinite blocky world. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, hunt, make traps and grow plants. Build a shelter to survive nights and share your worlds online. Ride horses or camels and herd cattle. Blast your way through the rock with explosives. Build complex electric devices. Possibilities are infinite in this sandbox survival and construction game.This is the twenty third release of Survivalcraft, and it adds new survival mechanics, such as hunger and stamina! You can till soil and grow your own food from seeds. A large number of new animals have been introduced, such as orcas, zebras, lions, rhinos, and more. The animals now use pathfinding to locate their goals and prey. Boats allow you to visit remote islands far out in the ocean.Survivalcraft brings features you love in the PC version of Minecraft to your mobile device: infinite worlds, caves, logic elements (electricity), weather, boats, and many more. It does so while maintaining its own realistic, survival-themed style.Enjoy!Website: http://kaalus.wordpress.com

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Better and cheaper than minecraft pe. Would be better if there was multiplayer and if you guys could add armor, that would be awesome and would give five star. Besides that good game.
reviews.author: Angel Correa

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Love it, a lot better than mine craft pe. More blocks and I love the animals and stuff. Keep the good work up!
reviews.author: Jack Russel

reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
reviews.comment: Love this game. It would be cool if it had villages. Ocelots Bones you can give wolves But way better than Minecraft PE
reviews.author: Emily Julian

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Love this game and it\'s a great creative timekiller too. Plus its way better than minecraft pocket addition. But the reason I only give this app four stars is there\'s no multiplayer. Please add multiplayer and I\'ll give this app 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jason Lestander

reviews.title: Better than Minecraft Pocket Edition
reviews.comment: This is the game that lets you get your Minecraft on with a mobile device, free from the 256x256 prison of the Pocket Edition. Unbounded world, actual 3x3 crafting, and much more feature-rich than MCPE\'s current version. It still lacks a lot of things to make it comparable to Minecraft on PC, such as armor and bows, but the developer is always actively working to improve it - rideable horses and camels were added just a week ago. It also eschews Minecraft\'s fantasy elements - there\'s no alternate dimension,
reviews.author: Stephen Karnas

reviews.title: Needs a little more
reviews.comment: I LOVE this game. But it need a little bit more like being able to tame animals, baby animals, villages, mods, skins, and multiplayer.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: My first Minecraft experience was with Minecraft PE. I became a huge fan but truth be told, Survival craft is much much better than Minecraft PE. If you want a true Minecraft experience in your mobile device go for survival craft. I would give it 6 starts if the rating and multiplayer was available.
